title: Analyze a Commercial Investment Property
description: An investment sales agent must analyze a multi-tenant office building for a potential buyer.

tasks.description: Obtain and review the property's financial documents, including the rent roll and operating expense statements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts key financial data like Gross Income and Net Operating Income (NOI).

tasks.description: Calculate the property's capitalization (cap) rate based on the asking price and NOI.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the cap rate.

tasks.description: Prepare an investment summary report for the buyer, including the financial analysis and market comparables.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a comprehensive investment memorandum.
